# target

**Instance Property**

The target for double-click actions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var target: AnyObject! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The target is the object on which the action specified by [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPeoplePickerView/groupDoubleAction] and [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPeoplePickerView/nameDoubleAction] is invoked.

## Managing Actions

- **clearSearchField(_:)**: Clears the search field and resets the list of displayed records.
- **editInAddressBook(_:)**: Launches Address Book to edit the item selected in the people picker.
- **groupDoubleAction**: The action to be invoked when a group is double-clicked.
- **nameDoubleAction**: The action to be invoked when a name is double-clicked.
- **selectInAddressBook(_:)**: Launches Address Book and selects the item selected in the people picker.
